name: PlayQuester
description:
**Play with audio on**
Playtesting makes perfect, right? In PLAYQUESTER, you play as an indie developer who just submitted a story-driven, action-adventure game to the GMTK game jam. But wait! When you uploaded the game, something went wrong and (somehow) your assets got all scrambled around! Try to fix playtesters’ experiences by switching the assets back where they belong before they notice just how broken your game is!
